content:
Who is Big? 
 Sara Saunders 
 English 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Ant loked at the litle 
 
 plants and pebles around 
 
 him. "I am big!" he said. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 "No, Ant. You are not big," 
 
 said Squirel. "I am big!" 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 2  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 "No, Squirel. You are not 
 
 big," said Cat. "I am big!" 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 3  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 "No, Cat. You are not big," 
 
 said Hyena, "I am big!" 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 "No, Hyena. You are not 
 
 big," said Rhinoceros, "I am 
 
 big!" 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 5  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 "No, Rhinoceros. You are 
 
 not big," said Elephant, "I 
 
 am big!" 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Then Elephant loked up at 
 
 the sky. The sky was ful of 
 
 stars. The sky was big and 
 
 wide. It stretched forever in 
 
 every direction. "No, I am 
 
 not big, either! Al of us are 
 
 smal!" smiled Elephant. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 7
